Prepare

Install

conda create Selina
conda activate Selina

Before you start to install Selina, make sure you have install the following R packages.

  • Seurat

  • presto

  • ggplot2

  • dplyr

  • data.table

pip install Selina

Prepare data

Training data

reference/
├── train1_expr.txt
├── train1_meta.txt
├── train2_expr.txt
└── train2_meta.txt

expr

Gene Cell1 Cell2
NOC2L 7 3
ISG15 10 2

meta

Celltype Platform
Cell1 10x
Cell2 10x
